alert.note: Alert for Bolivar; Sunflower (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 03 at 6:42AM CST until January 03 at 7:30AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Sunflower County in northwestern Mississippi... East central Bolivar County in northwestern Mississippi... * Until 730 AM CST. * At 642 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mound Bayou, or 8 miles northwest of Drew, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Parchman and Rome around 655 AM CST. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for north central and northwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
